items.closingStatement: And you are ready to go! Now you can make your first transaction!!
registrationStep: 1. Collect a KYC form and fill in the required details.
2. Provide copies of all valid ID's to the happiness guide.
3. Confirm the details with your happiness guides at the counter.
items.caption: New to LuLu family?
items.openingStatement: No worries.. We are here to help! Follow these simple steps
